title: Timing Design Engineer
summary: At Apple, we work every single day to craft products that enrich people’s lives. We have an opportunity for a results-oriented and extraordinarily talented Timing Design Engineer. As a member of our group, you will craft upcoming products that will delight customers every day.
description: As a Timing Design engineer, you will be involved with all phases of physical design of high performance PHY design from RTL to delivery of our final GDSII.
key_qualifications: Preferred relevant experience in Physical Design experience on high PHY and/or SOC designs. Deep knowledge of industry standards and practices in Timing closures, Physical Design, including Physically aware synthesis. Deep understanding of all aspects of Timing flow, Physical construction, Integration and Physical Verification. Confirmed knowledge of Basic SoC Architecture and HDL languages like Verilog. Experienced user of industry standard Timing, Physical Design and Synthesis tools. Deep Understanding of scripting languages such as Perl/Tcl.
education_experience: BS degree in technical discipline with minimum 3 years of relevant experience.
pay_benefits: At Apple, base pay for this role is between $135,400 and $250,600. Additional benefits include Comprehensive medical and dental coverage, retirement benefits, discounted products and free services, educational reimbursement, discretionary bonuses or commission payments, and relocation assistance.
